title: Project-Based Learning for Developing Emotional Intelligence for Engineering Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering knowledge and collaborative work experience
context.additional_context: Building a real-time collaboration and feedback system utilizing digital tools

learning_goals: Students can explain at least 3 strategies for recognizing and managing their emotions during project execution
Students can apply emotional intelligence-based communication techniques to resolve conflict situations within teams using real-world case studies
Students can design delivery methods considering the emotional responses of audiences (evaluators/peers) during project presentations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
